entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming north 20 after midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
